Server.Name: Wastleland Transportation - v1.0
Server.Description:
A simple SDX 7d2d mod mostly made to utilize MANOX's Custom Vehicles mod. Focuses on lowering system load to allow for more vehicles in multiplayer. Traders and Crafting Removed. Loot and Kill for credits and buy directly online.
This mod includes mods by other modders: - dll updates by HAL9000 - Custom Vehicles by MANUX - Simple UI by Stedman420 - Bigger Back Pack, Mini Bike, Containers, and Crafting Slots by MANUX - Take and Replace by Sphereii - Survivors and Bandits by MANUX (inspired by Bad Company) - Vehicle Workbench Combine Feature by Annabella - Custom Categories by Sphereii - AnimationSDX by Sphereii - Entity Player by Sphereii - Zombie Transmogrifier by Sphereii
